talk.author: did:plc:763shrefrtd7brbvxkqkwp3h
talk.utter: that's awesome! I love when that happens, I've made life long friends through things like that too. Do you happen to know how seasons work? Is that more story?

talk.author: did:plc:aydwjhcnn5c4o2qhwesxkilk
talk.utter: So there's the base story which is the same for everyone, and seasons run for a couple of months each season. It has new story, mechanics, seasonal power, etc. We had one season before this current one so far^^

talk.author: did:plc:aydwjhcnn5c4o2qhwesxkilk
talk.utter: So there's the base story which is the same for everyone, and seasons run for a couple of months each season. It has new story, mechanics, seasonal power, etc. We had one season before this current one so far^^

talk.author: did:plc:763shrefrtd7brbvxkqkwp3h
talk.utter: amazing! Ugh I'm sad I missed a season =( I'm a completionist so I hate missing content XD

talk.author: did:plc:aydwjhcnn5c4o2qhwesxkilk
talk.utter: I mean, minus cosmetics and getting units when they were the featured banner you don't lose much. Each season resets your seasonal power, your base power gets stronger as you collect more units and upgrade them.
